title: Red Hat Podman 'Lab' Gets Developers Started on GenAI
author: Joab Jackson
description: Unlike many tools for building generative AI apps, the Podman AI Lab was built specifically for developers, rather than data scientists.
cntitle: Red Hat Podman“实验室”帮助开发者开始使用 GenAI
cndescription: 与许多用于构建生成式 AI 应用程序的工具不同，Podman AI Lab 是专门为开发者而非数据科学家构建的。
